mapper.select: select t1.user_id , t1.role_id , t1.pass_word, t1.login_name, t1.user_name, t1.tel, t2.image_url AS headimg, t1.birth_day, t1.sex, t1.bz from t_sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_image t2 ON t1.headimg = t2.recourse_id AND t2.delete_flag = 0 where t1.login_name = #{loginName}

select t1.user_id , t1.role_id , t1.pass_word, t1.login_name, t1.user_name, t1.tel, t2.image_url AS headimg, t1.birth_day, t1.sex, t1.bz from t_sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_image t2 ON t1.headimg = t2.recourse_id AND t2.delete_flag = 0 where t1.user_id = #{userId}

select t1.user_id ,t1.user_name,t1.login_name,t1.sex,t1.birth_day,t1.tel ,t1.delete_flag ,t2.`name` AS roleName,t2.id As roleId from t_sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_role t2 ON t1.role_id=t2.id AND t2.delete_flag =0
t1.user_name like "%"#{userName}"%" or t1.login_name like "%"#{userName}"%"

SELECT name,parent_id as pid,perm_id as id,icon_cls ,path FROM t_sys_permission WHERE FIND_IN_SET(perm_id,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(permission_id) FROM t_role_permission WHERE role_id=#{roleId})) and delete_flag=0
SELECT t2.image_id, t2.image_url FROM t_sys_user t1 inner join t_sys_image t2 on t1.headimg=t2.recourse_id and user_id = #{userId}
